description: xrange is a compiled extension that provides numeric iteration primitives to PHP on top of SPL. It includes a lean numeric range generator / iterator, modeled after Python's xrange() function. It's intended to provide an alternative for all numeric iteration and looping.
name: xrange

1.3.2.releaseNotes:
- Fixed build on PHP 5.3+
- Fixed memory leaks

1.3.1.releaseNotes:
- Fixed version numbering scheme (x.y.z)
- Added missing classes to php_info output
- Fix for bug #13225 - implicit declaration warnings

1.3.releaseNotes:
- PECL migration
- Added three new filter iterators
